panels.settings.buttons.filters.name: Name
Send the new message to use for the new addons
Send the new message to use for the updated addons

Avaible Variables:
[[name]]: Name of the mod. [[author]]: Name of the creator of the mod. [[authorUrl]]: URL to the mod's creator's profile. [[version]]: Latest mod version in the versions list. [[versions]]: List of the mod's supported versions. [[modloaders]]: List of the mod's supported modloaders. [[categories]]: List of the mod's categories. [[description]]: Description of the mod. [[created]]: Creation date of the mod. [[modified]]: modification date of the mod. [[color]]: Color of the mod. [[follows]]: Amount of people who follow the mod. [[downloads]]: Amount of the mod's downloads. [[icon]]: Icon of the mod. [[license]]: The license of the mod. [[clientSide]]: Whether the mod is required on the client. [[serverSide]]: Whether the mod is required on the server. [[slug]]: The ID of the mod on modrinth. [[platform]]: The platforms where the mod is avaible (currently only Modrinth).
Conditional Variables:
[[?variable:true|false?]] example: [[?name:The name is [[name]]|Missing name?]] Sends "The name is (nome)" if the "name" variable exists, otherwise sends "Missing name". [[?author:The author is [[author]]|?]] Manda "The author is (nome)" if the "name" variable exists, otherwise doesn't send anything.
You updated the message for the new addons
You updated the message for the updated addons
commands.setchannel.messages.success: This chat has been configured for the addons notifications
commands.settings.messages.notConfigured: This chat has not been configured for the addons notifications
commands.settings.messages.success: Settings for the Create addons notifications
commands.start.messages.success:
Welcome! This bot will allow you to receive notification when an addon for the Minecraft mod "Create" gets updated or created.
My commands are:

- /setchannel - Se the channel where to send addon notifications.
- /settings - Manage the settings of the bot.

Made by @Stef_DP and published on GitHub.
commands.preview.messages.notConfigured: This chat has been configured for the addons notifications
commands.preview.messages.invalidArgs: You must specify a message between "new" (new addon) or "update" (updated addon)
